name: 2024 5th International Conference on Geology and Earth Sciences
content: Journal: Full papers accepted of ICGES 2024 will be recommended to be published in International Journal of Geology and Earth Sciences (IJGES). ISSN: 2395-647X(Online) | DOI: 10.18178/ijges Abstracting/ Indexing: GeoRef (Elsevier), Crossref, Google Scholar, Genamics, Eurasian Scientific Journal Index (ESJI), etc.
